entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
